chatformatter.decorations.*.description: Formatting tags: Use <bold>, <italic>, <underlined>, <strikethrough>, and <obfuscated> tags for formatting text.

chatformatter.decorations.bold.description: Formatting tag for bold text: Use <bold> tag to make text bold.

chatformatter.decorations.italic.description: Formatting tag for italic text: Use <italic> tag to make text italic.

chatformatter.decorations.underlined.description: Formatting tag for underlined text: Use <underlined> tag to underline text.

chatformatter.decorations.strikethrough.description: Formatting tag for strikethrough text: Use <strikethrough> tag to strikethrough text.

chatformatter.decorations.obfuscated.description: Formatting tag for obfuscated text: Use <obfuscated> tag to obfuscate text.

chatformatter.reset.description: Formatting tag to reset formatting: Use <reset> tag to reset formatting.

chatformatter.gradient.description: Formatting tag for gradient text: Use <gradient> tag to apply gradient effect to text.

chatformatter.hover.description: Formatting tag for hover text: Use <hover> tag to add hover functionality to text.

chatformatter.click.description: Formatting tag for clickable text: Use <click> tag to make text clickable.

chatformatter.insertion.description: Formatting tag for inserted text: Use <insertion> tag to insert predefined text.

chatformatter.font.description: Formatting tag for font selection: Use <font> tag to select a specific font for text.

chatformatter.transition.description: Formatting tag for transition effect: Use <transition> tag to apply a transition effect to text.

chatformatter.translatable.description: Formatting tag for translatable text: Use <lang> tag to mark text for language translation.

chatformatter.selector.description: Formatting tag for selector text: Use <selector> tag to select specific text.

chatformatter.keybind.description: Formatting tag for keybind text: Use <key> tag to represent a keybind.

chatformatter.newline.description: Formatting tag for a new line: Use <newline> tag to add a new line.
